Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Atmosphere Regulator^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;抵抗立场发生器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Excellent, i'll use my 3d scanner to copy it. There we go. As promised, a ton of money.
Texts.Chs: 优秀。我会使用我的3D扫描仪来复制它。按照承诺，我会给你一大笔钱。

Texts.Eng: I need an ^green;atmosphere regulator^reset; so I can colonize a hostile world. You'll find it at your ^orange;Power Station^reset;. I'll need to keep it for a while but I'll pay top dollar for it.
Texts.Chs: 我需要一个^green;抵抗立场发生器^reset;，这样一来我就可以不再惧怕星球上的恶劣环境了！你可以在你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;里找到它。我会为此付你钱的。
